title: (x) fonts that convey "Las Vegas" - various {Paul}
content:
I’m not sure if this is the right forum. But i was curious what you experts thought.

i need a font that conveys the idea of ‘Las vegas’

I googled but nothing that i really want
author: chrisjleenet

comments.content:
Vegas = cheesy, fake, in a smoke-filled kinda way with dice patterned carpet.

Vegas = cheap buffets with vats of “scrambled” eggs and bacon. Mmm, mmm, grease!

Vegas = _What happens here stays here. Um, unless you get hepatitis… or worse._
Joe did you read about one developer in Vegas is going to recreate the (NY) village in that city. Talk about tacky!

vegas. it is cheap. it is tacky. and heaven knows i hate that much heat. but, it is where my grandma lays and my grandpa lives. it is where you can find unicahome. you can also find the coolest signage graveyard in the world. latenight cheesecake with chocolate truffle sauce. twilight swimming. count the stars (if you are far enough away from the strip) with nary a cloud in the sky.

house industries and font diner are the perfect suggestions.

That was unfair of me to mention my grandma being buried there. Didn’t mean to kill the tacky thread. I really shouldn’t post to Typophile early in the morning.

Vegas is tacky. Embrace the tack!
